medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed abdominal pain and vomiting approximately 2 or 3 days ago. He last had a bowel movement 3 days ago and has vomited 4 times on the day of admission. While on public transportation to the emergency department, he felt a major increase in the pain and called paramedics. He denies fever but endorses chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, cholelithiasis, thalassemia trait. No prior history of surgery.
